install.name: GCalendar Upcoming Events
install.author: Allon Moritz
install.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License.
install.description: This module shows the upcoming events from a google calendar.

param.name: dateFormat
param.label: Date format
param.description: The format of the date for an event (see http://www.php.net/strftime for details).

param.name: timeFormat
param.label: Time format
param.description: The format of the time for an event (see http://www.php.net/strftime for details).

param.name: max
param.label: Max events
param.description: The maximal count of events should be displayed.

param.name: order
param.label: Sort Order
param.description: The order strategy of the events.

param.name: output
param.label: Event output
param.description: Here you can customize the appearance of the event.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module.

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached in sec.
